variables.expression: IRNET + TAXANET + TAXLOYNET + PCAPNET + HAUTREVNET - IRESTITIR
variables.name: NAPTIR

variables.expression: (TOTIRCUM - NONMER -RECUMIR + NONREST) * positif(20 - V_NOTRAIT) + max(0, (TOTIRCUM - NONMER - RECUMIR+NONREST) - (V_TOTIRANT -V_NONMERANT - V_ANTREIR+V_NONRESTANT)) * positif_ou_nul(V_NOTRAIT-20)
variables.name: NAPCOROLIR

variables.expression: si ( NAPINI - V_ANTIR - IRCUM_A + RECUMBIS >= SEUIL_12 ) alors (1) sinon (0) finsi
variables.name: RC1

variables.expression: ( IRD + PIRD - IRANT ) + TAXASSUR + IPCAPTAXT + IHAUTREVT + TAXLOY + RASAR * V_CR2
variables.name: NAPI

variables.expression: (positif(2006-arr(INTAN))*max(0, (INTAN - (V_ANREV+1) )* 12 + INTMS - 6 ) * TXMOISRETARD + positif_ou_nul(V_ANREV-2006)*max(0, (INTAN - (V_ANREV+1) )* 12 + INTMS - 6 ) * TXMOISRETARD2 + (1-positif(2006-arr(INTAN)))*(1-positif_ou_nul(V_ANREV-2006)) * (((2006 - (V_ANREV+1))*12 - 6) * (TXMOISRETARD * positif(2006 - (V_ANREV+1)) + TXMOISRETARD2 * null(2006-(V_ANREV+1))) + ((INTAN - 2006)*12 + INTMS) * TXMOISRETARD2) ) * present(MOISAN)
variables.name: TXINT

variables.expression: si (CMAJ = 7 ou CMAJ = 10 ou CMAJ = 17 ou CMAJ = 18) alors (10) sinon ( si (CMAJ = 8 ou CMAJ = 11) alors (40) sinon (80) finsi ) finsi
variables.name: COPETO

variables.expression: max(0,CSG + RDSN + PRS + BREGV + CVNSALC + CDIS + CGLOA + RSE1N  + RSE2N + RSE3N + RSE4N + RSE5N)
variables.name: CSTOTSSPENA

variables.expression: arr(BTO * COPETO / 100) + arr(BTO * COPETO /100) * positif(null(CMAJ-10)+null(CMAJ-17)) + arr((BTOINR) * TXINT / 100)
variables.name: PTOIR

variables.expression: ( arr(max(0,PRS-PRSPROV) * COPETO / 100) + arr(max(0,PRS-PRSPROV-PS9YP) * TXINT / 100) ) * positif_ou_nul(CSTOTSSPENA - SEUIL_61)
variables.name: PTOPRS

variables.expression: ( arr(max(0,CSG-CSGIM) * COPETO / 100) + arr(max(0,CSG-CSGIM-CS9YP) * TXINT / 100) ) * positif_ou_nul(CSTOTSSPENA - SEUIL_61)
variables.name: PTOCSG

variables.expression: ( arr(max(0,RDSN-CRDSIM) * COPETO / 100) + arr(max(0,RDSN-CRDSIM-RD9YP) * TXINT / 100) ) * positif_ou_nul(CSTOTSSPENA - SEUIL_61)
variables.name: PTORDS

variables.expression: arr(max(0,TAXASSUR- min(TAXASSUR+0,max(0,INE-IRB+AVFISCOPTER))+min(0,IRN - IRANT)) * COPETO / 100) + arr(max(0,TAXASSUR- min(TAXASSUR+0,max(0,INE-IRB+AVFISCOPTER))+min(0,IRN - IRANT)) * COPETO /100) * positif(null(CMAJ-10)+null(CMAJ-17)) + arr(max(0,TAXASSUR- min(TAXASSUR+0,max(0,INE-IRB+AVFISCOPTER))+min(0,IRN - IRANT)-TAXA9YI) * TXINT / 100)
variables.name: PTOTAXA

variables.expression: arr(max(0,IPCAPTAXT- min(IPCAPTAXT+0,max(0,INE-IRB+AVFISCOPTER-TAXASSUR))+min(0,IRN - IRANT+TAXASSUR)) * COPETO / 100) + arr(max(0,IPCAPTAXT- min(IPCAPTAXT+0,max(0,INE-IRB+AVFISCOPTER-TAXASSUR))+min(0,IRN - IRANT+TAXASSUR)) * COPETO /100) * positif(null(CMAJ-10)+null(CMAJ-17)) + arr(max(0,IPCAPTAXT- min(IPCAPTAXT+0,max(0,INE-IRB+AVFISCOPTER-TAXASSUR))+min(0,IRN - IRANT+TAXASSUR)-CAP9YI) * TXINT / 100)
variables.name: PTOTPCAP

variables.expression: arr(max(0,TAXLOY- min(TAXLOY+0,max(0,INE-IRB+AVFISCOPTER-TAXASSUR-IPCAPTAXT))+min(0,IRN - IRANT+TAXASSUR+IPCAPTAXT)) * COPETO / 100) + arr(max(0,TAXLOY- min(TAXLOY+0,max(0,INE-IRB+AVFISCOPTER-TAXASSUR-IPCAPTAXT))+min(0,IRN - IRANT+TAXASSUR+IPCAPTAXT)) * COPETO /100) * positif(null(CMAJ-10)+null(CMAJ-17)) + arr(max(0,TAXLOY- min(TAXLOY+0,max(0,INE-IRB+AVFISCOPTER-TAXASSUR-IPCAPTAXT))+min(0,IRN - IRANT+TAXASSUR+IPCAPTAXT)-LOY9YI) * TXINT / 100)
variables.name: PTOTLOY

variables.expression: arr(max(0,IHAUTREVT+min(0,IRN - IRANT+TAXASSUR+IPCAPTAXT+TAXLOY)) * COPETO / 100) + arr(max(0,IHAUTREVT+min(0,IRN - IRANT+TAXASSUR+IPCAPTAXT+TAXLOY)) * COPETO /100) * positif(null(CMAJ-10)+null(CMAJ-17)) + arr(max(0,IHAUTREVT+min(0,IRN - IRANT+TAXASSUR+IPCAPTAXT+TAXLOY)-CHR9YI) * TXINT / 100)
variables.name: PTOTCHR

variables.expression: (arr(max(0,CVNSALC - COD8YT) * COPETO / 100) + arr(max(0,CVNSALC - COD8YT-CVN9YP) * TXINT / 100)) * positif_ou_nul(CSTOTSSPENA - SEUIL_61)
variables.name: PTOCVN

variables.expression: max( 0 ,IRN-IRANT) + max(0,TAXASSUR- min(TAXASSUR+0,max(0,INE-IRB+AVFISCOPTER))+min(0,IRN - IRANT)) + max(0,IPCAPTAXT- min(IPCAPTAXT+0,max(0,INE-IRB+AVFISCOPTER-TAXASSUR))+min(0,IRN - IRANT+TAXASSUR)) + max(0,TAXLOY- min(TAXLOY+0,max(0,INE-IRB+AVFISCOPTER-TAXASSUR-IPCAPTAXT)) +min(0,IRN - IRANT+TAXASSUR+IPCAPTAXT)) + max(0,IHAUTREVT+min(0,IRN - IRANT+TAXASSUR+IPCAPTAXT+TAXLOY))
variables.name: BINRIR

variables.expression: max(0,CSG-CSGIM)+ max(0,RDSN-CRDSIM) + max(0,PRS-PRSPROV) + max(0,CVNSALC - COD8YT) + max(0,CDIS - CDISPROV) + max(0,CGLOA-COD8YL) + max(0,RSE1-CSPROVYD) + max(0,RSE2-CSPROVRSE2) + max(0,RSE3-CSPROVYG) + max(0,RSE4-CSPROVRSE4) + max(0,RSE5-CSPROVYE)+BREGV
variables.name: BINRPS

variables.expression: positif(IPCAPTAXT + TAXLOY + IHAUTREVT) * arr(VAR9YIIR * max(0,TAXASSUR- min(TAXASSUR+0,max(0,INE-IRB+AVFISCOPTER))+min(0,IRN - IRANT))/BINRIR) + (1-positif(IPCAPTAXT + TAXLOY + IHAUTREVT)) * max(0,VAR9YIIR - IR9YI)
variables.name: TAXA9YI

variables.expression: positif(TAXLOY + IHAUTREVT) * arr(VAR9YIIR * max(0,IPCAPTAXT- min(IPCAPTAXT+0,max(0,INE-IRB+AVFISCOPTER-TAXASSUR))+min(0,IRN - IRANT+TAXASSUR))/BINRIR) + (1-positif(TAXLOY + IHAUTREVT)) * max(0,VAR9YIIR - IR9YI - TAXA9YI)
variables.name: CAP9YI

variables.expression: positif(IHAUTREVT) * arr(VAR9YIIR * max(0,TAXLOY- min(TAXLOY+0,max(0,INE-IRB+AVFISCOPTER-TAXASSUR-IPCAPTAXT)) +min(0,IRN - IRANT+TAXASSUR+IPCAPTAXT))/BINRIR) +(1-positif(IHAUTREVT)) *  max(0,VAR9YIIR - IR9YI - TAXA9YI - CAP9YI)
variables.name: LOY9YI

variables.expression: max( 0 , IRN - IRANT ) * positif( IAMD1 + 1 - SEUIL_61 )
variables.name: BTO

variables.expression: max( 0 , IRN - IR9YI - IRANT ) * positif( IAMD1 + 1 - SEUIL_61 )
variables.name: BTOINR

variables.expression: max(0, RSE8TV - CIRSE8TV - CSPROVYF) + max(0, RSE8SA - CIRSE8SA - CSPROVYN) + PRSE2
variables.name: RSE2NET

variables.expression: max(0, RSE8TX - CIRSE8TX - CSPROVYH) + max(0, RSE8SB - CIRSE8SB - CSPROVYP) + PRSE4
variables.name: RSE4NET

variables.expression: max(0,CSGC + PCSG - CICSG - CSGIM +RDSC + PRDS - CIRDS - CRDSIM+ PRSC + PPRS - CIPRS - PRSPROV + CVNSALC + PCVN - COD8YT + BREGV + PREGV +CDISC + PCDIS - CDISPROV + CGLOA + PGLOA - COD8YL +RSE1 + PRSE1+RSE2 + PRSE2+ RSE3 + PRSE3+RSE4 + PRSE4+ RSE5 + PRSE5 - CIRSE1 - CSPROVYD - CIRSE5 - CSPROVYE - CIRSE2 - CSPROVRSE2 - CIRSE3 - CSPROVYG - CIRSE4 - CSPROVRSE4)
variables.name: TOTCRBRUT

variables.expression: CSNET+ RDNET+ PRSNET+ CVNNET+ REGVNET +CDISNET+CGLOANET+ RSE1NET+ RSE2NET+ RSE3NET+ RSE4NET+ RSE5NET
variables.name: TOTCRNET

variables.expression: arr(RDRFPS * (1-null(4-V_REGCO)) + (COD8XK + COD8YK + RDRV + RDRCM + RDNP + RDNCP + RDPTP + ESFP + R1649 + PREREV) * (1-V_CNR)) * (1 - positif( present(RE168) + present(TAX1649))) + (RE168 + TAX1649) * (1-V_CNR)
variables.name: BPRS

variables.expression: arr(RDRFAPS * (1-null(4-V_REGCO)) + (RDRVAPS + RDRCMAPS + RDNP + ESFP + R1649 + PREREV) * (1-V_CNR)) * (1 - positif( present(RE168) + present(TAX1649))) + (RE168 + TAX1649) * (1-V_CNR)
variables.name: BPRSAPS

variables.expression: arr(BRSE8TV * TXTV/100) * (1 - positif(ANNUL2042)) + arr(BRSE8SA * TXTV/100) * (1 - positif(ANNUL2042))
variables.name: RSE2

variables.expression: arr(BRSE8TX * TXTX/100) * (1 - positif(ANNUL2042)) + arr(BRSE8SB * TXTX/100) * (1 - positif(ANNUL2042))
variables.name: RSE4

variables.expression: max(0 , RFCF + RFMIC - MICFR - RFDANT) * (1 - positif(ART1731BIS)) + max(0 , RFCF + RFMIC - MICFR + DEFRF4BC)  * positif(ART1731BIS)
variables.name: RDRF

variables.expression: max(0 , RFCFPS + RFMIC - MICFR - RFDANT)* (1 - positif(ART1731BIS)) + max(0 , RRFI + REVRF + DEFRF4BC) * positif(ART1731BIS)
variables.name: RDRFPS

variables.expression: max(0 , RFCFAPS + RFMIC - MICFR - RFDANT ) * (1 - positif(ART1731BIS)) + max(0 , RFCFAPS + RFMIC - MICFR +  DEFRF4BD+DEFRF4BC ) * positif(ART1731BIS)
variables.name: RDRFAPS

variables.expression: TRCMABD + DRTNC + RAVC + RCMNAB + RTCAR + RCMPRIVM + RCMIMPAT - RCMSOC -  positif(RCMRDS) * min(RCMRDS , RCMABD + REVACT + RCMAV + PROVIE + RCMHAD  + DISQUO + RCMHAB + INTERE + RCMTNC + REVPEA + COD2FA )
variables.name: RDRCM1

variables.expression: RCMABD + RCMTNC + RCMAV + RCMHAD + RCMHAB + REGPRIVM + RCMIMPAT - RCMSOC -  positif(RCMRDS) * min(RCMRDS , RCMABD + RCMAV + RCMHAD + RCMHAB + RCMTNC + COD2FA )
variables.name: RDRCM1APS

variables.expression: arr(RVB1 * TXRVT1 / 100) + arr(RVB2 * TXRVT2 / 100) + arr(RVB3 * TXRVT3 / 100) + arr(RVB4 * TXRVT4 / 100)
variables.name: RDRVAPS

variables.expression: BPVSJ + BPVSK + BPV18V + BPV18C + BPCOPTV + BPCOPTC + BPV40V + BPV40C + BPCOSAV + BPCOSAC + PEA + GAINPEA
variables.name: PVTAUXPS

variables.expression: BAF1AV + BAF1AC + BAF1AP + BA1AV + BA1AC + BA1AP + max(0,MIB1AV - MIBDEV) + max(0,MIB1AC - MIBDEC) + max(0,MIB1AP - MIBDEP) + BI1AV + BI1AC + BI1AP + max(0,MIBNP1AV - MIBNPDEV) + max(0,MIBNP1AC - MIBNPDEC) + max(0,MIBNP1AP - MIBNPDEP) + BI2AV + BI2AC + BI2AP + max(0,BNCPRO1AV - BNCPRODEV) + max(0,BNCPRO1AC - BNCPRODEC) + max(0,BNCPRO1AP - BNCPRODEP) + BN1AV + BN1AC + BN1AP + max(0,BNCNP1AV - BNCNPDEV) + max(0,BNCNP1AC - BNCNPDEC) + max(0,BNCNP1AP - BNCNPDEP) + PVINVE + PVINCE + PVINPE + PVSOCV + PVSOCC
variables.name: RDPTP

variables.expression: arr(RDRFPS * (1-null(4-V_REGCO)) + (COD8XK + COD8YK + RDRV + RDRCM + RDNP + RDNCP + RDPTP + ESFP + R1649 + PREREV)*(1-V_CNR) ) * (1 - positif(present(RE168) + present(TAX1649))) + (RE168 + TAX1649) * (1-V_CNR)
variables.name: BCSG

variables.expression: arr(RDRFAPS * (1-null(4-V_REGCO)) + (RDRVAPS + RDRCMAPS + RDNP + ESFP + R1649 + PREREV)*(1-V_CNR)) * (1 - positif(present(RE168) + present(TAX1649))) + (RE168 + TAX1649) * (1-V_CNR)
variables.name: BCSGAPS

variables.expression: CSPROVYD + CSPROVYE + CSPROVYF + CSPROVYN + CSPROVYG + CSPROVYH + CSPROVYP
variables.name: RSEPROVTOT

variables.expression: min ((BCSG) * (1-V_CNR), max( 0, (RDRFPS+RDRV +RDNP+ max(0,RDRCM1) + PVBARPS - IPPNCS)  * (1-V_CNR) )) * (1 - positif(present(RE168)+present(TAX1649))) * (1- positif(ABDETPLUS)) + min ((BCSG) * (1-V_CNR), BDCSG3VA)
variables.name: BDCSG

variables.expression: si (V_IND_TRAIT = 4) alors ((arr((BGLOA -(COD8YL/0.075))* TX051 / 100)) * positif(CSREC))  sinon (abs(DGLOD - V_IDGLOANT)) finsi
variables.name: IDGLO

variables.expression: positif(ABDETPLUS +0) * min( arr((ABDETPLUS + COD3UA + 0) * TX051/100) , COD3UA)
variables.name: CSGDED3UA

variables.expression: positif(ABDETPLUS +0) * arr(( PVBARPS - ABDETPLUS - COD3UA + 0) * TX051/100)
variables.name: CSGDEDAUTRE

variables.expression: positif(ABDETPLUS) *  max(0, RDRV + max(0,RDRCM1) + RDRFPS + RDNP + PVBAR3VA - IPPNCS) * (1-V_CNR) * (1 - positif(present(RE168)+present(TAX1649)))
variables.name: BDCSG3VA

variables.expression: (arr(BDRSE1 * TXTQDED/100) + arr(BDRSE2 * TXTVDED/100) + arr(BDRSE3 * TXTWDED/100) + arr(BDRSE4 * TXTXDED/100) + arr(BDRSE5 * TX051/100) ) * positif(CSREC+V_IDRSEANT) * positif(NAPCR61)
variables.name: DRSED

variables.expression: si (V_IND_TRAIT = 4) alors (positif(CSREC)*(arr(BDRSE1 * TXTQDED/100) + arr(BDRSE2 * TXTVDED/100) + arr(BDRSE3 * TXTWDED/100) + arr(BDRSE4 * TXTXDED/100) + arr(BDRSE5 * TX051/100) ) ) sinon (abs(DRSED - V_IDRSEANT)) finsi
variables.name: IDRSE

variables.expression: si (V_IND_TRAIT = 4) alors ((arr(BDCSG * T_IDCSG / 100)-DCSGIM) * positif(CSREC)) sinon ( si (CRDEG = 0 et NAPCRP = 0) alors (0) sinon (abs(DCSGD - V_IDANT )) finsi ) finsi
variables.name: IDCSG

variables.expression: arr(RDRFPS * (1-null(4-V_REGCO)) + (COD8XK + COD8YK + RDRV + RDRCM + RDNP + RDNCP + RDPTP + RGLOA + SALECS + SALECSG + ALLECS + INDECS + PENECS + COD8SA + COD8SB + ESFP + R1649 + PREREV) * (1-V_CNR) ) * (1 - positif(present(RE168) + present(TAX1649))) + (RE168 + TAX1649) * (1-V_CNR)
variables.name: BRDS

variables.expression: arr(RDRFAPS * (1-null(4-V_REGCO)) + (RDRVAPS + RDRCMAPS + RDNP + SALECS + SALECSG + ALLECS + INDECS + PENECS + ESFP + R1649 + PREREV) *(1-V_CNR) ) * (1 - positif(present(RE168) + present(TAX1649))) + (RE168 + TAX1649) * (1-V_CNR)
variables.name: BRDSAPS

variables.expression: (RDPTP + PVINVE+PVINCE+PVINPE + somme(i=V,C,P:BN1Ai + BI1Ai + BI2Ai + BA1Ai )) * (1 - positif(IPVLOC))
variables.name: CSRTF

variables.expression: arr(BASSURV1 * TX_ASSUR1/100 + BASSURV2 * TX_ASSUR2/100 + BASSURV3 * TX_ASSUR3/100) * (1 - positif(RE168 + TAX1649))
variables.name: TAXASSURV

variables.expression: arr(BASSURC1 * TX_ASSUR1/100 + BASSURC2 * TX_ASSUR2/100 + BASSURC3 * TX_ASSUR3/100) * (1 - positif(RE168 + TAX1649))
variables.name: TAXASSURC
